content: up the other button band continue working st st until piece ws *k1 p1* repeat ** to end of measures 8 8 5 10 12 15 17 row 20 inches from cast on edge rs bind off bind off sew on two buttons at the top © raya budrevich of blissful arms knits & dyeworks all rights with rs facing starting with right reserved 2010 this is a personal shoulder pick up 3 out of 4 stitches use pattern you may not sell or across front side pick up all profit from items made with this stitches across bottom of arm pattern this pattern may not be opening pick up 3 out of 4 stitches reprinted or distributed in any across back side of vest form for free or for resale ws k1 p1 repeat to end of row questions email photuris@gmail com or visit rs bind off www blissfulknits com for pattern support every effort has been made repeat for second arm to ensure that the pattern is as complete as possible and the pattern has been carefully tested and edited page 5 of 5
